title: ThemePen
author: ThemePen
content: Again one more April Fool. Here you can see which notification.I was shocked when I received this notification. (Merits: 1000) You received 50 merits from satoshi for Re: I am back!

comments.author: Suzume
comments.body: Congratulations ThemePen best wishes for getting 50 merits from satoshi

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: ThemePen on April 01, 2023, 02:31:33 AMAgain one more April Fool. Here you can see which notification.I was shocked when I received this notification. (Merits: 1000) You received 50 merits from satoshi for Re: I am back!

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: I was wowed of the "50 merits" when I was notified of the splash from Satoshi but what gave it out was the YouTube link ðŸ˜‚. Immediately I saw that link I knew something was wrong and needed to check my profile to confirm it. How it escaped my mind it was another April Fool prank, even though I thought of it until yesterday.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: It's funny that you guys were successfully Rick rolled by @TryNinja despite telegram not parsing the text correctly.As soon as I saw the text I just immediately knew that this must be an April fool attempt and I'm not going to fall for any of them. If not for the fact the the text did not come out as expected I'm sure we would have had more people complaining of "missing merits"

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on April 01, 2023, 07:42:42 AMIt's funny that you guys were successfully Rick rolled by @TryNinja despite telegram not parsing the text correctly.As soon as I saw the text I just immediately knew that this must be an April fool attempt and I'm not going to fall for any of them. If not for the fact the the text did not come out as expected I'm sure we would have had more people complaining of "missing merits" Good one @TryNinja I'm impressed, sadly only those that have the Bitcointalk SuperNotifier bot activated on their telegram gets to experience this April fool's joke. It was a very clever trick but kind of scary to me. I thought my account was trying to be hacked as I saw the message, I was about reporting the incident thinking it's some hack attempt and if the link is been clicked, you'll be compromised so I didn't bother clicking. Good thing I visited the the meta baord before trying to report the incident if not I would be looking stupid by now. Funny I didn't even know today was the first of April, the year is just running too fast already we're in the fourth month of the year. Assuming I remember today was April fool's day, I would had done some pranks myself. I love pranks and I remember my days of doing them on the service board. Feel good to have some laugh thanks @TryNinja.
